books.Title: Dune
books.Description: It tells the story of young Paul Atreides, whose family accepts the stewardship of the planet Arrakis.
books.Author: Frank Herbert

books.Title: Foundation
books.Description: in the waning days of a future Galactic Empire, the mathematician Hari Seldon spends his life developing a theory of psychohistory, a new and effective mathematics of sociology.
books.Author: Isaac Asimov
